mapper.insert: insert into request (id, c_title, c_category, content, price, c_location, c_startday, c_starttime, c_period)values (#{id}, #{c_title}, #{c_category}, #{content}, #{price}, #{c_location}, #{c_startday}, #{c_starttime}, #{c_period})
mapper.select: select * from request order by id desc

select * from request where 1=0
or c_title like '%${keyword}%' or c_category like '%${keyword}%' or c_location like '%${keyword}%'
or c_category like '%${category}%'
or 1=1
order by number desc limit #{skip}, #{qty}
mapper.update: update request set teacher=#{teacher}, r_status="${offer}" where number=${number}
